reuters.title: ST GALLEN LAUNCHES 50 TO 60 MLN SWISS FRANC BOND
reuters.body: The Swiss canton of St Gallen is launching a 50 to 60 mln Swiss franc 4-1/4 pct maximum 12-year bond at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager St Gallen Kantonalbank said. Subscriptions close April 15 and payment date is April 30. REUTER 
